body.title: Classes
Getters and setters
isset vs empty
body.elms:
```php

$options = [
    'key' => 'value',
    'blank' => '',
    'nothing' => null,
];

var_dump(isset($options['key']), empty($options['key'])); // true, false
var_dump(isset($options['blank']), empty($options['blank'])); // true, true
var_dump(isset($options['nothing']), empty($options['nothing'])); // false, true
```
